mapper.select: select s.sname from student s inner join studentexamanswer g on g.sid = s.sid where eid = #{eid} order by g.totalscore asc
select totalscore from studentexamanswer where eid = #{eid} order by totalscore asc

select exam_manage.endTime , studentexamanswer.totalscore from exam_manage INNER JOIN studentexamanswer on exam_manage.eId = studentexamanswer.eid where studentexamanswer.sId=#{sid} order by exam_manage.eId asc
select studentexamanswer.totalscore from exam_manage INNER JOIN studentexamanswer on exam_manage.eId = studentexamanswer.eid where studentexamanswer.sId=#{sid} order by exam_manage.eId asc
